from OTC_DERIVATIVE_COUNTERPARTY
order by ${orderByClause}

update OTC_DERIVATIVE_COUNTERPARTY
CORPORATE_NAME = #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABBREVIATION = #{abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_ABBREVIATION = #{nameAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTERED_ADDRESS = #{registeredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_ADDRESS = #{officeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCOPE_BUSINESS = #{scopeBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LIMITED_DATE = #{limitedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MAJOR_MECHANISM = #{majorMechanism,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATURE = #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APTITUDE = #{aptitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIST_ATTRIBUTE = #{listAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAPITAL_ATTRIBUTE = #{capitalAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVESTMENT_VARIETIES = #{investmentVarieties,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARTY_CONTACTMAN = #{partyContactman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTUAL_CONTROLLER = #{actualController,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OTC_DERIVATIVE_COUNTERPARTY WHERE IS_PROD_HOLDER = '03' AND CORPORATE_NAME = #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM OTC_DERIVATIVE_COUNTERPARTY WHERE IS_PROD_HOLDER ='02' AND CORPORATE_NAME = #{corporate_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT CLIENT_ID FROM OTC_DERIVATIVE_COUNTERPARTY WHERE CORPORATE_NAME = #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_PROD_HOLDER = '03'
